Plot: As the Berlin Wall crumbles, Katrine, the daughter of a Norwegian woman and a German occupation soldier, finds her idyllic life disrupted as she refuses to testify a trial against the Norwegian state on behalf of her fellow "war children."
Title: Two Lives
Writer: Georg Maas (screenplay), Christoph Tölle (screenplay), Ståle Stein Berg (screenplay), Judith Kaufmann (screenplay), Hannelore Hippe (novel), Hannelore Hippe (collaboration on screenplay), Änne Tröster (dubbing dialogue)
Actors: Juliane Köhler, Liv Ullmann, Sven Nordin, Ken Duken
